title: Define Project Scope and Requirements - Revised
description:
Gather and document the comprehensive requirements for the BrainHealthMonitor system. Detailed scope includes: 
1. Types of neurological indicators to be tracked (e.g., cognitive function, sleep patterns, stress levels, physical activity, brain imaging data) 
2. Data sources (e.g., wearable devices, user input, medical records, third-party data providers) 
3. Target users (e.g., patients, healthcare providers, researchers, caregivers) 
4. Desired features (e.g., data visualization, alerts, recommendations, integration with electronic health records, data privacy and security measures, user authentication and authorization, scalability and performance considerations). Additionally, outline any potential integration or collaboration with existing systems or platforms.
Please note that the project is expected to comply with all relevant industry standards and regulations for medical devices and data privacy. Considering the long-term maintenance and evolution of the system, include a plan for future updates and scalability.
Lastly, ensure that accessibility considerations are addressed in the design and development process.
Please provide detailed wireframes or mockups for key user interfaces to clarify the intended user experience.
If possible, research and suggest potential AI/ML models that could be integrated into the system to improve its functionality.
After reviewing the requirements, please provide a rough timeline for each phase of development and an initial estimate of resources required.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Develop the overall system architecture, including the components, data flow, and integration points.

title: Design Data Storage and Management
description: Design the data storage and management strategy, including the database schema, data ingestion pipelines, and data processing mechanisms.

title: Develop User Interface
description: Design and implement the user interface for the BrainHealthMonitor system, including data visualization and user interaction components.

title: Implement Backend Services
description: Develop the backend services for data processing, analysis, and integration with external systems.

title: Establish Security and Compliance
description: Define and implement security measures, data privacy protocols, and compliance with relevant regulations.

title: Set up Continuous Integration and Deployment
description: Establish a CI/CD pipeline for automated testing, building, and deployment of the BrainHealthMonitor system.

title: Create Documentation and User Guides
description: Develop comprehensive documentation, including technical specifications, user guides, and training materials.

title: Conduct Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Plan and execute thorough testing and quality assurance activities, including unit tests, integration tests, and user acceptance testing.
